title: Bug 4971: Strange 'copy package'
description: Bug 4971: Strange 'copy package' 2031. org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui in jdt.ui3. Select xxx as destination5.
OB: During the 'copy package' operation, the destination package is not set to 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui'.
EB: The destination package should be set to 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui' during the 'copy package' operation.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open jdt.ui3.
2. Go to the 'copy package' feature.
3. Select 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui' as the destination package.
